summary: The implementation successfully addresses all three requirements. REQ-14 (prediction data loading) is implemented via a new getStockPrediction query and useStockPrediction hook with proper error/loading handling. REQ-15 (expanded autocomplete) is fulfilled with 110+ NSE stocks across multiple sectors. REQ-16 (backend data structures) is satisfied through a migration file that populates predictionData with sample data for multiple stocks. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) implementing data migration logic
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention implementing a migration system or module. While this may be a valid technical approach to populate data, it was not explicitly requested.
